Detailed Description

Person class.

This class implements a person, which is used as a player in the walk game. The person reads input from the keyboard and mouse, moves, animates, fires guns and much more.

Fly3D Game Engine ver 2.0 - http://www.fly3d.com.br
Copyright, 2000 Pararelo Computação Ltda.
